alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 7:04PM MDT until July 06 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dawson County in northeastern Montana... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 703 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lindsay, or 18 miles west of Glendive, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... West Glendive, Lindsay and Forest Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
